name: Biceps Brachii
action: Flexion of the elbow and supination of the forearm

name: Deltoid
action: Abduction, flexion, and extension of the shoulder

name: Rectus Femoris
insertion: Patella via Quadriceps Tendon and Tibial Tuberosity
action: Flexion of the hip and extension of the knee

name: Gastrocnemius
action: Plantarflexion of the ankle and flexion of the knee
